subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jelena Jankovic and Novak Djokovic won their singles matches Sunday as top-seeded Serbia beat Taiwan, 3-0, at the mixed-teams Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia.Jankovic defeated Hsieh Su-wei, 6-4, 6-4, and Djokovic rallied to beat Lu Yen-hsun, 7-5, 2-6, 6-3.
